title: The OnePlus 12 is $150 Cheaper Right Now
description: Buyers after a competent smartphone will want to check out this deal, which takes off $150 from the OnePlus 12's asking price. The post The OnePlus 12 is $150 Cheaper Right Now appeared first on Phandroid.
author: Mike Viray
excerpt: Buyers after a competent smartphone will want to check out this deal, which takes off $150 from the OnePlus 12's asking price.
text: The OnePlus 12 is undoubtedly one of the most attractive Android phones available right now, made possible with a great combination of performance and a price that’s lesser than most flagship devices. OnePlus’ latest premium phone offers some pretty compelling reasons to get one, and buyers after a competent smartphone will want to check out this deal, which takes off $150 from the handset’s asking price. As for specifications, the OnePlus 12 features a sharp 2K-resolution display with a 120Hz refresh rate, and is powered by the Qualcomm Snapdragon 8 Gen 3 chipset. There’s also an option with up to 16GB of RAM, making this one of the fastest phones in the market, in addition to a camera setup that packs a 50MP main camera. Lastly, the phone comes with a massive 5,400 mAh battery, which can charge instantly thanks to 80W fast charging speeds. You can check it out using the link below.
